comments:
M3

I got the following exception during a refresh with all repositories. I was 
loading another project out of the repository for the first time when this 
happened.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Sep 04, 2003 16:06:21.625
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Team refresh with all 
repositories".

I have released the modifications to EclipseSynchronizer that fix this problem.
*** Bug 42178 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
